content.raw: I'm not yet sure which solution for the resolution I'd prefer. I mean, at least for me the motivation of switching to GPU laser is to have better performance when simulating robots with not only one but multiple LIDARs on board. So I think the resolution should be as high as needed but not higher.
content.html: I'm not yet sure which solution for the resolution I'd prefer. I mean, at least for me the motivation of switching to GPU laser is to have better performance when simulating robots with not only one but multiple LIDARs on board. So I think the resolution should be as high as needed but not higher.
